remarks: Prior to part 14 in [Baer] p. 49, line 25.  (Contributed by NM, 31-May-2015.)
statement:
hdmap14lem1a.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
hdmap14lem1a.u $e |- U = ( ( DVecH ` K ) ` W ) $.
hdmap14lem1a.v $e |- V = ( Base ` U ) $.
hdmap14lem1a.t $e |- .x. = ( .s ` U ) $.
hdmap14lem1a.r $e |- R = ( Scalar ` U ) $.
hdmap14lem1a.b $e |- B = ( Base ` R ) $.
hdmap14lem1a.c $e |- C = ( ( LCDual ` K ) ` W ) $.
hdmap14lem2a.e $e |- .xb = ( .s ` C ) $.
hdmap14lem1a.l $e |- L = ( LSpan ` C ) $.
hdmap14lem2a.p $e |- P = ( Scalar ` C ) $.
hdmap14lem2a.a $e |- A = ( Base ` P ) $.
hdmap14lem1a.s $e |- S = ( ( HDMap ` K ) ` W ) $.
hdmap14lem1a.k $e |- ( ph -> ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) ) $.
hdmap14lem3a.x $e |- ( ph -> X e. V ) $.
hdmap14lem1a.f $e |- ( ph -> F e. B ) $.
hdmap14lem1a.z $e |- .0. = ( 0g ` R ) $.
hdmap14lem1a.fn $e |- ( ph -> F =/= .0. ) $.
hdmap14lem1a $p |- ( ph -> ( L ` { ( S ` X ) } ) = ( L ` { ( S ` ( F .x. X ) ) } ) ) $.
